name: EKAlarm
desc: A class that represents an alarm.

items.name: init(absoluteDate: Date)
items.desc: Creates and returns an alarm with an absolute date.

items.name: init(relativeOffset: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates and returns an alarm with a relative offset.

items.name: var absoluteDate: Date?
items.desc: The absolute date for the alarm.

items.name: var relativeOffset: TimeInterval
items.desc: The offset from the start of an event, at which the alarm fires.

items.name: enum EKAlarmProximity
items.desc: A value indicating whether an alarm is triggered by entering or exiting a region.

items.name: var proximity: EKAlarmProximity
items.desc: A value indicating how a location-based alarm is triggered.

items.name: var structuredLocation: EKStructuredLocation?
items.desc: The location to trigger an alarm.

items.name: enum EKAlarmType
items.desc: A value that specifies what type of action occurs when the alarm triggers.

items.name: var type: EKAlarmType
items.desc: The type of action to trigger when the alarm fires.

items.name: var emailAddress: String?
items.desc: The recipient of an email to send when the alarm triggers.

items.name: var soundName: String?
items.desc: The name of the sound to play when the alarm triggers.
